cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in Burj Capital. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Grade A+ Office Tower in Business Bay
project_info_text:
Burj Capital is a premium commercial tower in the heart of Business Bay, designed for modern companies that want flexibility, prestige, and connectivity. Shell & core office floors allow you to shape your ideal workspace, while panoramic views over the canal, parks, and Downtown skyline set the tone.

The project is built around a lifestyle-led business environment with multiple amenity decks—spaces for wellness, meetings, and downtime—so work feels less like a grind and more like a system.
amenities_title: Amenities for work, wellness, and daily comfort
project_summary_title: Business Bay. Premium offices. Strong positioning.
project_summary_subtitle: A commercial address built for visibility, growth, and long-term value.
map_text: Business Bay offers direct access to Sheikh Zayed Road and Al Khail Road, with fast reach to Downtown and key commercial districts. A central address with the canal, parks, and skyline as your everyday backdrop.
footer_tagline: Premium commercial tower in Business Bay
